mapper.sql: quality_plan_id AS "qualityPlanId", plan_coding AS "planCoding",plan_name AS "planName", plan_status AS "planStatus", plan_type AS "planType", attention_please AS "attentionPlease", plan_adjunct AS "planAdjunct", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_quality_plan where 1 = 1
and quality_plan_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.qualityPlanId},'%')
and plan_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.planName},'%')
and plan_status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.planStatus},'%')
and plan_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.planType},'%')
and plan_adjunct like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.planAdjunct},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
